data.description: The role of a Developer is to translate software requirements into workable programming code and maintain and develop programs for use in business
The role of a desingner are works on a variety of products and activities, such as websites, advertising, books, magazines, posters, computer games, product packaging
The role of a software tester can vary depending on project requirements includes stress testing,performance testing,functional testing and scalability testing
The role of a manager maintains staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees; maintaining a safe, secure, and legal work environment; developing personal growth opportunities

The role of a HR are recruiting staff - this includes developing job descriptions and person specifications, preparing job adverts, checking application forms, shortlisting, interviewing and selecting candidates and preparing staff handbooks
